thread.title: BRIEF-Silver Viper Signs LOI With Pan American Silver To Consolidate La Virginia Gold-Silver Project

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Silver Viper Signs LOI With Pan American Silver To Consolidate La Virginia Gold-Silver Project

organizations.name: pan american silver to consolidate la virginia gold-silver project feb

text:
Feb 5 (Reuters) - Silver Viper Minerals Corp:
* SILVER VIPER SIGNS NON-BINDING LOI WITH PAN AMERICAN SILVER CORP. TO CONSOLIDATE LA VIRGINIA GOLD-SILVER PROJECT, SONORA, MEXICO
* SILVER VIPER MINERALS CORP - ‍SIGNING OF A NON-BINDING LETTER OF INTENT WITH PAN AMERICAN SILVER CORP. TO ACQUIRE LA VIRGINIA PROJECT​
* SILVER VIPER MINERALS - ‍SILVER VIPER TO ACQUIRE 100% OWNERSHIP OF PROJECT Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
